question: Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
question_with_options:
Consider the real-world 3D location of the objects. Which object is further away from the camera?
A. "Do not block" sign
B. NBA 2K10 advertisement board
C. None
D. None
triage_reason: The NBA 2K10 advertisement board is visibly mounted higher on a distant building, while the "Do not block" sign is closer to the foreground on a pole, making the billboard clearly further away in 3D space.
